Interface uci.graph.GraphNodeRenderer

  Summary 

public interface  GraphNodeRenderer
{
          // Methods 1
     public abstract FigNode getFigNodeFor(GraphModel, Layer, Object);
}

An interface for FigNode factories. Similiar in concept to the Swing class TreeCellRenderer.

See Also: DefaultGraphNodeRenderer, uci.graph.demo.WordNodeRenderer
